application.doc: Retrieving junction average response times for a Reverse Proxy instance

param.name: date
param.doc: The starting time, represented as a UNIX time stamp.

param.name: duration
param.doc: The duration of records from the starting time to retrieve, in seconds. (For example, 86400 for one day)

param.name: instance
param.doc: The name of the Reverse Proxy instance to retrieve records for.

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieving junction average response times for a Reverse Proxy instance
method.doc: To retrieve junction average response time records for a Reverse Proxy instance using the web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: bucket_size
param.doc: The interval of the records, in seconds. (For example, 600 for ten minutes, 86400 for 24 hours)

param.name: duration
param.doc: The duration of the records returned, in seconds. (For example, 600 for ten minutes, 86400 for 24 hours)

param.name: instance
param.doc: The name of the Reverse Proxy instance records were returned for.

param.name: start_time
param.doc: The time of the first record returned in this set.

param.name: t
param.doc: The starting time of this interval.

param.name: r
param.doc: The average response time during this interval, in ms. (Thousandths of a second)

param.name: n
param.doc: The total number of requests measured.
